import React from "react" // eslint-disable-next-line import prism from "prismjs" export const tooltipControlled = ( 
    
      {`
import React from "react"
import {Button, Tooltip} from "reactstrap"

class TooltipControlled extends React.Component {

  state = {
    tooltipOpen: false
  }

  toggleTooltip = () => {
    this.setState({
      tooltipOpen: !this.state.tooltipOpen
    })
  }

  render() {
    return(
      
      
        Hello World !
      
    )
  }
}
export default TooltipControlled
`}
) export const tooltipUncontrolled = ( 
    
      {`
import React from "react"
import {Button, UncontrolledTooltip} from "reactstrap"

class TooltipUncontrolled extends React.Component {


  render() {
    return(
      
      
        Hello World !
      
    )
  }
}
export default TooltipUncontrolled
`}
) export const tooltipPosition = ( 
    
      {`
import React from "react"
import {Button, UncontrolledTooltip} from "reactstrap"

class TooltipPosition extends React.Component {


  render() {
    return(
    
    
      Tooltip on Top
    

    
    
      Tooltip on Right
    

    
    
      Tooltip on Bottom
    

    
    
      Tooltip on Left
    
    )
  }
}
export default TooltipPosition
`}
)
